name: Two Button Dodger
description:
Only two buttons : Left and Right arrow keys.

Entry for Two Button Game Jam.

Note : I could not test browser version on my potato PC and hence I am not including it. Sorry :(

This game will be regularly updated and completed by the due date of the game jam.

Changelog-

-Added music

-Added new enemy

-Moved the player a little backward on screen

-Fixed some bugs

The music is not mine. Loved it,though.
